statements: SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 90
SELECT assignment_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY assignment_id
SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL
SELECT assignment_id, MAX(grade) AS max_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY assignment_id ORDER BY max_grade DESC
SELECT * FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY student_id DESC, assignment_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(assignment_id) > 2;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY highest_grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, SUM(grade) AS total_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_grade > 200;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM Grades WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, student_id, grade FROM grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT id, feedback FROM grades WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT assessment_type, COUNT(*) AS num_assessments FROM assessments GROUP BY assessment_type;
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE id = 1
SELECT grade, feedback FROM grades WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_result > 80 AND assessment_type = 'Midterm'
SELECT student_id, COUNT(assessment_date) AS assessment_count FROM assessments GROUP BY student_id HAVING assessment_count > 3
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM grades
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT assignments.title, grades.grade FROM assignments INNER JOIN grades ON assignments.id = grades.assignment_id;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT students.name, assignments.title, grades.grade FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.id = grades.student_id INNER JOIN assignments ON assignments.id = grades.assignment_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE id = '7d537871-5fc8-4031-a07e-34608a7cbf71';
SELECT name, email FROM students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT title, due_date FROM assignments WHERE due_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM grades WHERE assignment_id = 'b370b3cb-d4c2-47e2-a02c-f5b6cb08b167';

SELECT s.name AS student_name, a.title AS assignment_title, g.grade AS student_grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.id = g.student_id JOIN assignments a ON g.assignment_id = a.id ORDER BY g.grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignments;
SELECT title, deadline FROM assignments WHERE assignment_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, assignment_id, grade FROM grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT subject, date FROM assessments WHERE date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, feedback FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT assignment_id, AVG(grade) FROM grades GROUP BY assignment_id HAVING AVG(grade) > 80
SELECT subject, MAX(date) FROM assessments WHERE subject = 'Math'
SELECT title, deadline FROM assignments ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT feedback FROM student_feedback WHERE student_id = 100
SELECT * FROM grades;
SELECT id, student_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT id, name, email FROM students ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, title, due_date FROM assignments WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE assignment_id = 5 AND student_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE id = 3;
SELECT title, due_date FROM assignments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_id, MAX(grade) FROM grades GROUP BY assignment_id;
SELECT a.title, g.grade, s.name FROM assignments a JOIN grades g ON a.id = g.assignment_id JOIN students s ON g.student_id = s.id
